H0.text: Coal warms most of the air, water, and land on Earth.

H1.text: Electricity warms most of the air, water, and land on Earth.

H2.text: Sunlight warms most of the air, water, and land on Earth.

H3.text: Wind warms most of the air, water, and land on Earth.

A4.text: The warming of the ground (and other objects) depends on the absorption of the electromagnetic radiation in the form of heat.

A5.text: The total amount of energy received at ground level from the Sun at the zenith depends on the distance to the Sun and thus on the time of year.
